about.value: Toporama offers continuous map coverage for all of Canada available from national to regional and local topographic scales. The dynamic map viewer offers features for searching place names, zooming and panning, measuring distances, getting coordinates and more.

images.label: Place Name / Geographic Feature Names / Administrative Area names
Road A: hard surface, more than 2 lanes
Road C: hard surface, less than 2 lanes; Street: hard surface
Road D: loose surface, 2 lanes or more
Road E: loose surface, less than 2 lanes; Street: unpaved
Road G: Vehicle Track / Winter Road

customimage.description: Contour / Elevation Values: m = metres, ft = feet

items.subtitle: Toporama, CanMatrix Print ready and Georeferenced
